revision.text:
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Aura !! Effect !! Notes |- ! Aura Boost | Boosts aura effects of the 8 surrounding berries ||
This aura can only be applied to a berry once and does not affect other berries with this effect. |- ! Overgrow | Plants a berry of the same type in one of the 8 surrounding empty plots ||
Original berry needs to be ripe before this takes effect.
This counts as a mutation and is affected by the same mutation boosts. |- ! Parasite | Transforms a berry in one of the 8 surrounding berries into the same berry as the parasite ||
Original berry needs to be ripe before this takes effect.
This counts as a mutation and is affected by the same mutation boosts.
Parasite only affects berries in the taller and later stages. Seed and sprout cannot be taken over.
The newly taken over berry will start its timer at the start of the same stage as it was taken over. |- ! Death | Causes the surrounding 8 berries to wither more quickly ||
Only affects ripe berries.
Does not affect other berries with Death aura.
Effect does not stack. |- ! Harvest Amount | Changes the amount of berries obtained on harvest/wither for the 8 surrounding berries.||
Effect is multiplicative and stacks with [[Rich Mulch]] |- ! Growth Rate | Changes growth/wither time of the 8 surrounding berries ||
Effect is multiplicative and stacks with Death aura (once ripe), [[Sprayduck]], and [[Boost Mulch]] effects. |- ! Replant Chance | Changes the chance that any of the 8 surrounding berries will replant itself after withering ||
Effect is multiplicative and stacks with [[Sprinklotad]] |- ! Mutation Chance | Changes the chance that any of the 8 surrounding plots will mutate a berry if possible ||
Effect is multiplicative and stacks with [[Squirtbottle]] and [[Surprise Mulch]] effects.
Affects Overgrow and Parasite effects |- ! Kasib Prevention | Prevents berries from mutating into [[Kasib]] berries when they wither ||
A single berry with this ability will affect the entire field |- ! Wither Prevention | Prevents other berries from withering while this is berry is ripe ||
A single berry with this ability will affect the entire field.
Berries with this ability do not affect each other.
Once this berry withers or is harvested other berries will reset their timers from the beginning of the Ripe stage. |- ! Egg Growth | Increases the growth speed of eggs in the hatchery ||
Effect is multiplicative over the whole field.
Effect stacks with [[Blaze Cassette]] |- ! Shiny Chance | Increases chance of finding [[Shiny Chance|Shiny Pokémon]]||
Effect is multiplicative over the whole field.
Effect stacks with [[Shiny Charm]] |- ! Attract Aura | Increases chance of Pokémon [[Wandering Pokemon|wandering]] onto the farm ||
Effect is multiplicative over the whole field |- ! Roamer Chance | Increases chance of finding [[Roaming Pokemon|Roaming Pokémon]] on routes ||
Effect is multiplicative over the whole field |- ! EV Gain | Increases amount of [[Pokerus|EVs gained]] in all applicable situations. ||
Effect is multiplicative over the whole field |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
